statements: SELECT * FROM songwriters_and_composers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, genre FROM songwriters_and_composers WHERE years_active > 10;
SELECT * FROM songwriters_and_composers WHERE genre = 'Pop';
SELECT id, years_active FROM songwriters_and_composers ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT genre FROM songwriters_and_composers;
SELECT * FROM songwriters_and_composers ORDER BY name DESC, years_active ASC;
SELECT id, name, genre FROM songwriters_and_composers WHERE genre = 'Pop' OR genre = 'Rock' ORDER BY years_active DESC;
SELECT name, years_active, genre FROM songwriters_and_composers WHERE years_active > 10 AND genre = 'Jazz' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, years_active FROM songwriters_and_composers WHERE name LIKE 'John%' AND genre != 'Country' ORDER BY years_active DESC;
SELECT * FROM songwriters_and_composers WHERE years_active BETWEEN 5 AND 15 AND genre IN ('R&B', 'Hip Hop') ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM songwriters;
SELECT songwriter_name, genre FROM songwriters WHERE genre = 'Pop';
SELECT * FROM composers ORDER BY composer_name DESC;
SELECT composer_name, popular_creations FROM composers WHERE skill_level = 'Advanced';
SELECT id, songwriter_name, experience_years FROM songwriters WHERE experience_years >= 5;
SELECT * FROM songwriters WHERE genre = 'Pop' ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT composer_name, popular_creations FROM composers WHERE skill_level = 'Expert' AND popular_creations > 10 ORDER BY popular_creations DESC;
SELECT songwriter_name FROM songwriters WHERE genre = 'Rock' OR genre = 'Country';
SELECT * FROM composers ORDER BY popular_creations ASC, skill_level DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM songwriters WHERE experience_years >= 5;
SELECT * FROM songwriters;
SELECT songwriter_name, songwriter_genre FROM songwriters WHERE song_count > 10;
SELECT * FROM composers ORDER BY composer_name DESC;
SELECT composer_name, composition_count FROM composers WHERE composer_genre = 'Classical';
SELECT song_title, release_date FROM songs WHERE composer_id = 3 AND release_date < '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM songwriters;
SELECT composer_name, composer_genre, composition_count FROM composers WHERE composition_count > 10 ORDER BY composition_count DESC;
SELECT song_title, release_date FROM songs WHERE release_date >= '2021-01-01' AND release_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT songwriter_name, songwriter_genre, song_count FROM songwriters WHERE songwriter_genre LIKE '%pop%' ORDER BY songwriter_name ASC;

SELECT song_title, songwriter_name, composer_name FROM songs INNER JOIN songwriters ON songs.songwriter_id = songwriters.songwriter_id INNER JOIN composers ON songs.composer_id = composers.composer_id ORDER BY song_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM Songwriters;
SELECT composer_name, composer_country FROM Composers ORDER BY composer_age DESC;
SELECT song_title, release_date FROM Songs WHERE release_date >= '2020-01-01' ORDER BY release_date;
SELECT songwriter_name, songwriter_age, songwriter_country FROM Songwriters WHERE songwriter_country = 'USA';
SELECT singer_name, singer_genre, rating FROM Singers WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM Songwriters WHERE songwriter_country = 'USA';
SELECT songwriter_name, songwriter_age FROM Songwriters ORDER BY songwriter_age DESC;
SELECT singer_name, singer_genre FROM Singers WHERE rating > 8;
SELECT * FROM Composers WHERE composer_age BETWEEN 30 AND 50;
SELECT song_title, release_date FROM Songs WHERE songwriter_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM songwriters WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, awards FROM composers WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT title, genre FROM songs WHERE composer_id = 5 AND release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, age, city FROM singers WHERE awards >= 3 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT id, title FROM songs WHERE genre = 'Pop' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM songwriters WHERE age > 40 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT songs.title, songs.genre, composers.name, composers.city FROM songs JOIN composers ON songs.composer_id = composers.id;

SELECT songwriters.name AS songwriter_name, singers.name AS singer_name FROM collaborations JOIN songwriters ON collaborations.song_id = songwriters.id JOIN singers ON collaborations.singer_id = singers.id;
SELECT * FROM songs WHERE genre='Pop' AND release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT city FROM composers WHERE awards > 3 ORDER BY city ASC;
